articles.title: Video: Tapper calls out GOP figures who called story of 10-year-old rape victim a lie - CNN Video
articles.description: CNN's Jake Tapper calls out Republican officials and right-wing media figures who doubted the veracity of the story of a 10-year-old rape victim in Ohio who had to travel to Indiana to seek an abortion.

articles.author: Eliott C. McLaughlin, CNN
articles.title: How the Supreme Court recalibrated the abortion debate in just 3 words
articles.description: It's not just that US Supreme Court majorities upheld Mississippi's 15-week abortion ban and overturned Roe v. Wade. The opinion also skewed the crux of the conversation going forward -- with just three words.

articles.title: A fact-focused report on the Uvalde school massacre is expected to be released to the public Sunday
articles.description: A Texas House investigative committee is expected to release a preliminary report Sunday on the Uvalde, Texas, school massacre that left 21 people dead, more than a month after the group began its search for answers.

articles.title: Here's what the post-Roe polling says about voters' top issues

articles.title: Opinion: The horrific story of one little girl in America is a cautionary tale
articles.description: Historian of abortion Mary Ziegler writes of a 10-year-old Ohio girl whose story sparked a firestorm this week that as "appalling as the violence perpetrated against her was, it was also shocking to witness the reflexive doubt many had about her story.
